sentences.english: You may also forward us a list of qualified drivers from your respective countries for our reference.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以自貴國傳一份合格選手的名單給我們參考。

sentences.english: Is it customary for guests at hotels in your country to tip the waiters?
sentences.chinese: 在貴國住旅館的客人依慣例是否給侍者小費。

sentences.english: Therefore, I want to go to your post-graduate study.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我想去貴國學習深造。

sentences.english: Check with the U.S. embassy in your country to see whether other documentation is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 請向駐貴國的美國使領館詢問是否需要其他材料。

sentences.english: I respect your dedication to your studies and your deep concern for the honor of your country.
sentences.chinese: 我尊重你的奉獻你的研究和你的深切關懷榮譽貴國。

sentences.english: For the past five years, we have done a lot of trade with your company.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的五年中，我們與貴國進行了罅康拿騁住。

sentences.english: For the sake of convenience, you may contact our Commercial Counsellors' Office in your country for this matter.
sentences.chinese: 爲方便起見，可請徑與我國駐貴國的商務參贊處聯繫。

sentences.english: We''re deeply grateful to your country''s technicians for their considerable assistance.
sentences.chinese: 我們深深感激貴國技術人員的大力協助。

sentences.english: I have experienced this transformation of your country in a highly personal way.
sentences.chinese: 我個人親身體驗了貴國的這一鉅變。

sentences.english: Are any of the specific actions already being implemented in your country or region?
sentences.chinese: 有無任何具體行動已經在貴國或區域得到實施？

sentences.english: I want to thank you for the incomparable hospitality , for which your country is justly famous throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您無比盛情的款待，這也是貴國聞名於世之所在。

sentences.english: How to resolve the dispute in your country?
sentences.chinese: 在貴國怎樣解決國際貿易中的糾紛呢？

sentences.english: Look, your party, government and army leaders have left their seats.
sentences.chinese: 看，貴國的黨政軍領導人已經離開座位了。

sentences.english: Going to study in your business schools is one of the top choices of Chinese students.
sentences.chinese: 去貴國商學院修業成爲了我國粹子們的首選之一。

sentences.english: Importer: The development of ceramics in your country has been remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 貴國陶瓷業的發展切實不同凡響。

sentences.english: If a little accident like this perturbs your country.
sentences.chinese: 假如這麼一小小的意外也驚擾了貴國的話。
